headline: Golf legends Nicklaus, Player, Watson tee off delayed 2022 Masters
author: Alex Butler
sentences: April 7 (UPI) -- Hall of Fame golf trio Jack Nicklaus, Gary Player and Tom Watson served as honorary starters and teed off the 2022 Masters Tournament early Thursday, launching the first major of the PGA Tour season.
